member.name: T:MatrixMath
member.summary: Class that provides mathematical operations for matrices.

member.name: M:MatrixMath.Rotate2D(System.Double[0:,0:],System.Double)
member.summary: Rotates a square 2D matrix by a given angle in radians.
member.param: The angle to rotate by (in radians).
member.returns: The rotated matrix, or a matrix containing -1 if the input is invalid.
